scripts.prepare:dev: node scripts/verificar-tudo.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const d=p.join(__dirname,'node_modules/.vite');if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('✅ Cache removido');}else{console.log('ℹ️  Cache já limpo');}"
scripts.restart: node scripts/fix-env.js && echo. && echo ⚠️  IMPORTANTE: Pare o servidor (Ctrl+C) e execute: npm run dev
scripts.contracts:compile: node scripts/check-contracts.cjs && npm --prefix contracts run compile || echo Contracts not configured
scripts.contracts:export-abis: node scripts/check-contracts.cjs && npm --prefix contracts run export-abis || echo Contracts not configured
scripts.contracts:compile-and-export: node scripts/check-contracts.cjs && npm --prefix contracts run compile-and-export || echo Contracts not configured. Run 'npm run contracts:setup' to create contracts folder.
